comment: The right-hand side of ~ dvdsflsumcom is commutative in the variables, because it can be written as the manifestly symmetric sum over those ` <. m , n >. ` such that ` m x. n <_ A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
